name: Evo Tanks
description:
Evo tanks is a top-down arcade-like shooter game where you play as a tank whose goal is to survive. you have clear enemy after enemy and boss after boss in this gauntlet-style survival game.

There are also different unlockable tanks you can get by killing a number of specific enemies. These tanks will be stronger than the 2 base tanks that will make clearing enemies faster and more efficiently.
